repo_description: a boilerplate for your GraphQL server

schemas.name: Query.graphql

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/credcollective/perfect-graphql-starter/blob/4aee96413537871cd3f7a4f106796d442169f2f4/domain/schemas/Query.graphql:
type Query {
  getAuthor(_id: Int!): Author
  getPostsByAuthor(authorId: Int!): [Post]
  getPostsByTitle(titleContains: String!): [Post]
}

# https://github.com/credcollective/perfect-graphql-starter/blob/4aee96413537871cd3f7a4f106796d442169f2f4/domain/schemas/Author.graphql:
type Author {
  _id: Int!
  firstName: String
  lastName: String
  posts: [Post]
}

# https://github.com/credcollective/perfect-graphql-starter/blob/4aee96413537871cd3f7a4f106796d442169f2f4/domain/schemas/Post.graphql:
type Post {
  _id: Int!
  private: Boolean
  title: String
  text: String
  views: Int
  author: Author
}

schemas.name: Post.graphql
schemas.content:
type Post {
  _id: Int!
  private: Boolean
  title: String
  text: String
  views: Int
  author: Author
}

schemas.name: Author.graphql
